page.title: 06Attitudes To School
page.content: Question 1 was: Do you like school? The results to this question were: 1st yr class yes 24 no 7 don't know 0 2nd yr class yes 5 no 12 don't know 1 3rd yr class yes 7 no 6 don't know 15 4th yr class yes 12 no 10 don't know 8 As you can see the 1st years like school,but as they got older we found more people didn't know if they liked school(in other words you don't like or dislike school but you have attend. ) We found that Maths was considered the most important subject by all age groups,Maths was also the most disliked subject.In the 1st and 2nd year Art is the favourite subject.But in the 3rd and 4th year Games is the favourite.
